ValidationRule.description: For Finished Goods and TLAs categories, can't change Generation after record was saved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR ( PDLM__Category__r.PDLM__Parent__r.Name = "Finished Goods", PDLM__Category__r.PDLM__Parent__r.Name = "TLAs" ), ISCHANGED(Generation__c) , NOT(ISBLANK(CreatedDate)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Finished Goods and TLAs Categories the fields Generation can't be changed after Item was created.
